name: QLPreviewPDFStyle
desc: A value you use to configure the appearance of previews for PDF files.

items.name: init(UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a PDF style instance that configures the layout of previews for PDF files.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a PDF style instance that configures the layout of previews for PDF files.

items.name: var rawValue: UInt32
items.desc: The raw value that represents the layout of previews for PDF files.

items.name: var kQLPreviewPDFStandardStyle: QLPreviewPDFStyle
items.desc: The PDF appears in the operating system’s standard style.

items.name: var kQLPreviewPDFPagesWithThumbnailsOnLeftStyle: QLPreviewPDFStyle
items.desc: The content of the PDF appears with thumbnails of all pages on the left side of the current page’s content.

items.name: var kQLPreviewPDFPagesWithThumbnailsOnRightStyle: QLPreviewPDFStyle
items.desc: The content of the PDF appears with thumbnails of all pages on the right side of the current page’s content.
